department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Plate beige ground, light green glaze, scratched geometric designs, H.2-1/8 in., Diam.6-3/4 in.  Breaks repaired.  Provincial ware from Garrus District.  Slip carved ware.  Red earthenware covered with white slip carved away to paste.  Copper green or brownish glaze.  Heraldic eagle.
medium: Red earthenware with slip carved decoration
title: Bowl
